price: 19. Tai Diena, kai siela kitai sielai neturės jokios galios. Ir įsakymas Tą Dieną priklauso (visiškai) Allahui.
arabic: يَوۡمَ لَا تَمۡلِكُ نَفۡسٞ لِّنَفۡسٖ شَيۡـٔٗاۖ وَٱلۡأَمۡرُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلَّهِ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yawma lā tamliku nafsun linafsin shayan wal-amru yawma-idhin lillahi
